name: Relict
description:
Relict is an exploratory video game where you have the opportunity to look around and solve riddles based off of prehistoric tools. The goal of Relict is to reflect on how stories have been told through time. Throughout the game you are given auditory riddles to simulate the retelling of stories through oral practices.

Jam Theme: Lore

Game made solo in a 36 hour jam.

Source Credits:
Music from https://filmmusic.io/:
